name: Revathi
title: B.Tech Artificial Intelligence Student
summary: Third-year B.Tech Artificial Intelligence student with strong interest in Python, Machine Learning, and basic web development. Experienced in building beginner-level ML models and small data-driven applications. Actively seeking internship opportunities to gain hands-on industry experience and improve problem-solving skills.

education.college: SRM Institute of Science and Technology

projects.title: Crop Recommendation System
projects.description: Built a crop recommendation system that suggests suitable crops based on soil nutrients and location parameters to support farmer decision-making.

projects.title: House Price Prediction Model
projects.description: Developed ML models to predict Bengaluru house prices using Linear and Logistic Regression. Performed data preprocessing, basic feature engineering, and compared model accuracy.

projects.title: Guessing the Number Game
projects.description: Created a Python-based number guessing game using NumPy for random number generation and Pandas to store guesses with feedback. Displayed a summary table of all attempts at the end.

workshops.title: Generative AI Workshop
workshops.description: Attended hands-on sessions on Generative AI, prompt engineering, and practical applications using modern AI tools.
